results.title: A 79-Year-Old Woman With Dyspnea and Hypoxemia That Worsened in an Upright Position.
results.text_hl: Her current medication included @CHEMICAL_Esomeprazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064098 @@@esomeprazole@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@/@CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amitriptyline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000639 @@@amitriptyline@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Acetaminophen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000082 @@@acetaminophen@@@.

citations.NLM: van der Veer T, In 't Veen JCCM, den Dekker WK, Miedema J. A 79-Year-Old Woman With Dyspnea and Hypoxemia That Worsened in an Upright Position. Chest. 2017 Dec;152(6):e139-e142. PMID: 29223273
